quotes.quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
Never get jealous when you see your ex with someone else because our parents taught us to give our used toys to the less fortunate.
I get jealous because I'm afraid someone is going to you happier than I do.
A jealous woman does better research than the FBI.
If she jealous, she cares.
Oh no, was I to be one of those girls who gets attacked by a jealous girlfriend.
I'm not scared to admit that I'm a jealous girl. What's mine is mine, and that's that.
If your girlfriend gets jealous it's because she's faithful. If another girl has your attention and she doesn't get jealous, it's because someone has hers.
A jealous woman is the most dangerous one.
It is ridiculous to hang out with your girlfriend who gets jealous at everybody.
I believe that it isn’t normal to get jealous without any reason. There must be something that leads someone to become jealous.
There would be no jealous women if men are all loyal.
I must agree that every girl is jealous by nature.
I must admit that at one point in my life I get jealous over nothing and it causes me sleepless night.
A jealous girlfriend is a faithful girlfriend. You should worry if she doesn't care.
Anger and jealousy can no more bear to lose sight of their objects than love.
A jealous girlfriend is a faithful girlfriend, if she gets jealous its because someone has your attention, if she doesnt get jealous, its because someone else has hers.
Yeah, that's exactly what I want. To help my girlfriend get her old boyfriend back.
Jealousy is the dragon in paradise; the hell of heaven; and the most bitter of the emotions because associated with the sweetest.
Jealousy is the dragon in paradise, the hell of heaven, and the most bitter of the emotions because associated with the sweetest.
I'm not a jealous person. I'm just a girl that would love to punch every other girl in the face that gives you a second look.
You should never underestimate the power of your girlfriend. She has the ability to make anything your fault.
